MITREAttackScrapper.techniques package

Submodules

MITREAttackScrapper.techniques.enterprise module

class MITREAttackScrapper.techniques.enterprise.MITREAttackEnterpriseTechniques

Bases: MITREAttackInformation

A class containing methods to parse MITRE ATT&CK Enterprise techniques.

static get(technique_id: str) → Dict[str, Any]

Get the details of a specific MITRE ATT&CK technique for Enterprise.

Parameters:

technique_id (str) – The MITRE ATT&CK technique ID (e.g., T1548 or T1548.001).

Returns:

A dictionary containing technique information.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the technique ID is invalid or does not exist in the MITRE ATT&CK framework.

  • RuntimeError – If there’s a failure in fetching data from the MITRE ATT&CK website.

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

{
    "id": "T0001.001",
    "parent_technique_id": "T0001",
    "tactics": [
        {
            "name": "Tactic Name",
            "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/tactics/Tactic Name/"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "platforms": ["Platform1", "Platform2", ...],
    "permission_required": ["Permission1", "Permission2", ...],
    "version": "Version",
    "created": "Created Date",
    "last_modified": "Last Modified Date",
    "procedures": [
        {
            "id": "Procedure ID",
            "name": "Procedure Name",
            "description": "Procedure Description"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "mitigations": [
        {
            "id": "Mitigation ID",
            "name": "Mitigation Name",
            "description": "Mitigation Description"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "detection": [
        {
            "id": "Detection ID",
            "data_source": "Data Source",
            "data_component": "Data Component",
            "detects": "Detects"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "description": "Technique Description",
    "references": {
        1 : {
            "text": "Reference Text",
            "url": "Reference URL"
        },
        ...
    }
}
static get_child_technique(parent_technique_id: str, child_technique_id: str) → Dict[str, Any]

Given a parent and child technique ID, return the child technique information.

Parameters:

  • parent_technique_id (str) – The parent MITRE ATT&CK technique ID (e.g., T1548).

  • child_technique_id (str) – The child MITRE ATT&CK technique ID (e.g., T1548.001).

Returns:

A dictionary containing the child technique information.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the parent and child technique IDs are invalid or do not exist in the MITRE ATT&CK framework.

  • RuntimeError – If there’s a failure in fetching data from the MITRE ATT&CK website.

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

{
    "id": "T0001.001",
    "parent_technique_id": "T0001",
    "tactics": [
        {
            "name": "Tactic Name",
            "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/tactics/Tactic Name/"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "platforms": ["Platform1", "Platform2", ...],
    "permission_required": ["Permission1", "Permission2", ...],
    "version": "Version",
    "created": "Created Date",
    "last_modified": "Last Modified Date",
    "procedures": [
        {
            "id": "Procedure ID",
            "name": "Procedure Name",
            "description": "Procedure Description"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "mitigations": [
        {
            "id": "Mitigation ID",
            "name": "Mitigation Name",
            "description": "Mitigation Description"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "detection": [
        {
            "id": "Detection ID",
            "data_source": "Data Source",
            "data_component": "Data Component",
            "detects": "Detects"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "description": "Technique Description",
    "references": {
        1 : {
            "text": "Reference Text",
            "url": "Reference URL"
        },
        ...
    }
}
static get_list() → List[Dict[str, Any]]

Get the list of all MITRE ATT&CK techniques for Enterprise.

Returns:

A list of dictionaries containing technique information.

Return type:

List[Dict[str, Any]]

Raises:

RuntimeError – If there’s a failure in fetching data from the MITRE ATT&CK website.

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

[
    {
        "id": "T0001",
        "name": "Technique Name",
        "description": "Technique Description",
        "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T0001/",
        "sub_techniques": [
            {
                "id": "T0001.001",
                "name": "Sub-Technique Name",
                "description": "Sub-Technique Description",
                "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T0001/001/"
            },
            ...
        ]
    },
    ...
]
static get_parent_technique(technique_id: str) → Dict[str, Any]

Given a parent technique ID, return the parent technique information.

Parameters:

technique_id (str) – The parent MITRE ATT&CK technique ID (e.g., T1548).

Returns:

A dictionary containing the parent technique information.

Return type:

Dict[str, Any]

Raises:

  • ValueError – If the parent technique ID is invalid or does not exist in the MITRE ATT&CK framework.

  • RuntimeError – If there’s a failure in fetching data from the MITRE ATT&CK website.

Example

The structure of the returned data is as follows:

{
    "id": "T0001",
    "tactics": [
        {
            "name": "Tactic Name",
            "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/tactics/Tactic Name/"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "platforms": ["Platform1", "Platform2", ...],
    "permission_required": ["Permission1", "Permission2", ...],
    "version": "Version",
    "created": "Created Date",
    "last_modified": "Last Modified Date",
    "sub_techniques": [
        {
            "id": "T0001.001",
            "name": "Sub-Technique Name",
            "url": "https://attack.mitre.org/techniques/T0001/001/",
            "description": "Sub-Technique Description"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "mitigations": [
        {
            "id": "Mitigation ID",
            "name": "Mitigation Name",
            "description": "Mitigation Description"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "detection": [
        {
            "id": "Detection ID",
            "data_source": "Data Source",
            "data_component": "Data Component",
            "detects": "Detects"
        },
        ...
    ],
    "description": "Technique Description",
    "references": {
        1 : {
            "text": "Reference Text",
            "url": "Reference URL"
        },
        ...
    },
}
